title: Etiqa Phone Screen Protection
content:
#### ADVISORY: Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [Etiqa Full Phone Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection) - [Etiqa Phone Screen Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection) - [Express Send Scam Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18323082557465-Express-Send-Scam-Insurance) - [GCash Card Protect](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22690937303833-GCash-Card-Protect) - [GInsure Online Shopping Protect Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/12982084012441-GInsure-Online-Shopping-Protect-Insurance) - [PGA Sompo Online Shopping Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15544182259865-PGA-Sompo-Online-Shopping-Insurance) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) Etiqa Phone Screen Protection is a financial plan that offers protection from accidental screen damage to your mobile phone. Jump to: - [Eligibility](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAG53XS5EQHV8ZBQYJYTWR) - [Coverage](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAFYXBC6ES7NE29M1GWBHB) - [Purchase Etiqa Phone Screen Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAGBHQE6ZGRWP81H30X5JQ) - [Claims](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAGGAWA5KWFH46EV8ZY6YR) - [Cancellation](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAGN5WQSTN4KENMCY0CPJP) - [Contact Etiqa](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#h_01H4JAGT78MKJ12HT47MGS8DCP) ## Eligibility You can purchase this product for your own mobile device as long as it was purchased within 18 months without existing damage/s. You can own multiple policies, but you can only have one policy per device within a coverage period. ## Coverage Your coverage under this insurance product will include accidental screen damage, such as damage due to phone drop. ## Purchase Etiqa Phone Screen Protection **Note**: You cannot buy this policy for someone else. You cannot upgrade your current policy. **![How_do_I_apply_for_Etiqa_Phone_Screen_Protection.jpg](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/15599083427993)** ## Claims Please make sure that your policy is activated and prepare the following details: - Date of damage - Place of damage - Narration and description of the damage - Photos of damage To claim the benefits of your insurance, go to your policy page and tap **File a claim**. Provide the required details then tap **Submit.** The computation of the reimbursement/claim amount to be received is based on the payment plan you have selected upon purchase. | | | | --- | --- | | **Annual Payment** | **![Full_Phone__1.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/15583183088537)**
\*minimum of PHP 500 | | **Monthly Payment** | ![Full_Phone__2.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/15583168236441)
\*minimum of PHP 500
\*\*no. of months paid - annual premium | Below is a sample computation for **Plan 21 - Monthly Payment Plan:** ![Full_Phone__3.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/15583183307033) ## Cancellation You can request cancellation of your policy within **24-48 hours upon purchase**. Cancellation requests beyond the given timeframe will be subject to further investigation and approval. ## Contact Etiqa You may contact Etiqa via: **Phone No:** (02) 8890-1758 **Email**: [customersupport@etiqa.com.ph](mailto::customersupport@etiqa.com.ph) **Facebook Messenger**: @etiqaphilippines [Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#) [Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection#) 15543931946137
